summary: Completed comprehensive testing of NEW dashboard features: tabs (Pending/Approved/Waiting/Rejected), Application Control toggle in Settings, 'No Vacancies' page when disabled, and Waiting status functionality. All 14 backend API tests passed. All frontend UI tests passed.
passed_tests: Dashboard tabs: Pending (6), Approved (9), Waiting (1), Rejected (8) - all tabs found and clickable
Stats cards show correct counts for each category
Clicking on Waiting tab shows only waiting applications with WAITING badge
For waiting status applications: 'Convert Waiting Application' section visible
For waiting status applications: 'Approve - Position Available' button found
Settings page: Application Control section with toggle found
When toggle is OFF: /apply page shows 'Applications Currently Closed' message with clock icon
When toggle is ON: /apply page shows normal application form
GET /api/applications/settings/status returns correct enabled state (public endpoint)
Application status filtering by tabs works correctly
critical_code_review_comments: Final Decision buttons (Approve, Waiting List, Reject) only appear for 'pending' status applications - this is correct behavior as awaiting_review apps need votes first
Email functionality verified at code level - actual email delivery depends on SMTP credentials
seed_data_creation: None - used existing test data including waiting application ID: 00730009-67ba-436e-bc85-e30904f6842f
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features are working: Dashboard has 4 tabs (Pending/Approved/Waiting/Rejected), Settings has Application Control toggle, /apply shows 'No Vacancies' when disabled. The waiting application (JohnTheGreat) is in the Waiting tab. Final Decision buttons only show for 'pending' status (after votes cast), not 'awaiting_review'. Email functions are implemented but actual delivery depends on SMTP config.
